summary: Personal tweaks to the amazing Kountervibe ENB by Kyokushinoyama. Main changes to weathers.
descriptionHtml:
[center][font=Courier New][b][size=6]Alternate Kountervibe ENB[/size][/b]

These are my personal tweaks to the amazing [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58534/?]Kountervibe ENB[/url] created by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3463021/?]Kyokushinoyama[/url]. With his permission i decided to upload them here for other people to play around with and enjoy. I don't want to take credit for anything related to [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58534/?]Kountervibe ENB[/url], for i have simply tweaked the weather-files for my own liking. I don't claim that these tweaks make Kountervibe look "better" in any way, it's all a matter of taste. These tweaks suits my own preference, which is my own subjective opinion. Kyo created this amazing enb based on his own preferences, and i do respect that very much.

[size=4][b]What does this change?[/b]
[/size]- TimeOfDay enabled, weathers tweaked to fit this
- All sunny and clear weathers are tweaked (tell me if i missed some)
- Volumetric Rays tweaked a lot
- Fog intensity reduced for clearer distant terrain
- Mist redone
- Clouds are less intensive and more "defined"
- Water is tweaked for [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/41076/?]Realistic Water Two[/url]
- Lens intensity has been reduced for all clear and sunny weathers
- Sun tweaks
- Particle intensity has been reduced for night-time
- ENB rain disabled. I prefer [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/63478/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D63478&pUp=1]True Storms[/url] rain
- Other minor tweaks.

[size=4][b]Installation[/b]
[/size]Download [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/58534/?]Kountervibe ENB[/url] and endorse it! Overwrite his files with these files (Put them in the same folder). The Enbseries.ini file is based on Kountervibe quality preset and is tweaked for my own system. You should take a look at the AO- and Reflectionn scales before playing to make it optimal for your own system before playing.

[b]Version 2[/b] - use with [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/56279/?]ETHEREAL CLOUDS[/url] by [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/5712421/?]Gamwich[/url]

[size=4][b]My favorite landscape mods
[/b][/size][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/37865/?]aMidianBorn Landscape[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/59721/?]DynDOLOD[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/141/?]Flora Overhaul 2.3 Trees[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/42370/?]Unique Grasses and Groundcovers[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4834/?]High Quality LODs[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/48227/?]HD Detailed Terrain[/url]
[url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/54540/?]Rocking Stones and Mountains Two[/url]

[size=4][b]Tribute to Kountervibe ENB
[/b][/size]Do give [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/users/3463021/?]Kyokushinoyama[/url] all the credit for making Kountervibe and his other amazing enb's. Here is a gallery as a thanks for his amazing work![/font]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/VtThimr.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/FpLA8Df.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/QihjJlb.jpg[/img]

[img]http://i.imgur.com/sds9cxr.jpg[/img][/center]
author: Me

files.name: Alternate Kountervibe 2
files.changelogHtml:
More weathers covered
Sun adjusted a little
Fog adjusted a little
Lens intensity reduced for all (i hope) sunny weathers
Mist completely redone for day-time. Slight changes to mist for dawn and dusk
Sky-changes
